  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A LEAKER ON UNLOAD 97. THE LEAKER HAD A FLAMMABLE LIQUID HAZARD LABEL. WEARING PROPER PPE AND USING THE DECISION TREE CLEANED UP SPILL AND RETURNED TO CLERKS FO FURTHER PROCESSING.
